scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'backend,frontend' --prefix-colors 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold' "pnpm --prefix backend run dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.test: concurrently --names 'backend,frontend' --prefix-colors 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold' "pnpm --prefix backend run test" "pnpm --prefix frontend run test"
scripts.build: pnpm --prefix backend run build && pnpm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start: concurrently --names 'backend,frontend' --prefix-colors 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold' "pnpm --prefix backend run start" "pnpm --prefix frontend run build && pnpm --prefix frontend run start"
